response.overview: A music documentary, surrounding queer music culture, featuring live performances from the OUTmusic Awards and behind the scenes interviews with pioneers, recording artists, and activists from around the world. The film highlights LGBTQ and straight artists through numerous interviews with musicians and music-industry insiders, as well as live performances and behind-the-scenes footage. The participants include Michael Musto, Dolly Parton, Melissa Etheridge, Frenchie Davis, Diana King, Chely Wright, and transgender violinist and vocalist Tona Brown.
response.title: For Which We Stand
